txt.en: Talk to Arvaethor to dismiss him

This noble Arvaethor wishes to help you deal with the invasive White Mountain Orcs that descended upon Ringló Vale.\n\nYou should complete a number of tasks in Ringló Vale, using the whistle to call your friend for help if you become separated.
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
'I thank you for your aid in protecting the people of Ethring. Still, there is much to do.'
Arvaethor has asked you to join him on his task of protecting the Vale
Arvaethor asks for assistance as he patrols the Vale and secures its safety.
'Let us take back the Vale and push these Orcs into the mountains from whence they came! No longer will they pillage our trees and defile our waters.'
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
'Call me to your side when you wish to depart.'
Arvaethor is near the pillaged lumber camp in Ringló Vale.\n\nYou should speak with Arvaethor.
